description:
I was using KDE connect, with the smartphone App, but the remote input stopped working after I upgraded to 22.04.01 LTS. So i can just scan a QR code and control my PC from a browser tab in my Smartphone? You are crazy dude!
Only downside is that you have to scan the QR code too often, unless you only put your computer to sleep instead of shutdown, and keep the browser tab open in your Smartphone.
made life much easier

My touchpad on my laptop broke down, but now I can just use this instead. It works really fast and well, if your local network is fast enough. In my school the cursor lags sometimes, which is a bummer, but not a dealbreaker. I would highly recommend it
summary: My broken touchpad is no problem no more

description: Despite the negativity below, those who can think out of the "Box" should give it a try. It's easy to install and works right away.

So simple, so fast, so partcial.
Now I dont need to buy a wireless mouse. I can controll my multi-media system just with a QR-Code and my phone.

You are the reason why I love the linux world

It works flawlessly on 19.10

Use it with a tablet and you would not believe how great it is.

not working for me as of on iphone 7 +
and i am using it on ubuntu 20.04
Sorry if this is a stupid question, is there no left click right click functionality?
summary: Don't know how to use mouse buttons

description: This program opens a QR code on the target machine. Simply scan the QR code with the phone and the interface opens. That easy.
summary: No app needed on the tablet/phone

description: Can't run with ufw (Gufw, firewall) enabled. Once it changes the port each time I generate a new QRCode I'm not confident on how to set a rule to allow the incoming connection.
Accelleration would be nice!
thank you so much for this simple though practicle application...

I love this programm for easy control my DIY-SmartTV with my phone. But since the update where the "forward" "backward" and the "4 litte squares in 1 big square button" came into this programm, the controll gets very inaccurate, laggy, and you cant wake up the pc from suspend (i think the webbrowser gets inperformant and also sleeps when the pc sleeps.
summary: In the past perfect, now extremly laggy

description: not possible to use !!
2 seconds to setup. works as advertised

was searching for this app
easy to user

Works flawlessly on my laptop. Id be a little scared to use it on a public network, so maybe a bluetooth mode would be cool? Regardless, just make sure you are in a safe network, and you are golden.
Also, since its dependent on your internet connection, it might get a bit laggy if your internet sucks, but thats not on the programs behalf.
Really good app, one of those you can just boot up and not think about it anymore until you are done with it.
summary: Its really good, just download it

description: Works perfectly!

THANK U
THANK U
This installed on you laptop well but there is no clue as to which app I need to install on my smart phone.
Not Working! so manny things is wrong i'm getting errors about the file is not complete and also there is no guide about how to install / run / and use it.

I just installed it, connected to it all in a matter of minutes. it's web UI is simple and easy going , i just wish there was a android app for it, to avoid scanning the QR code everytime. I'm on Ubuntu 22 btw.
summary: Great, simple to setup and easy to use

description: nstalliert und losgelegt Programm tut was es soll keine weiteren Einstellungen notwendig
LO único que me suele ser necesario y no consigo es la funcion de click derecho y un portapapeles integrado para copiar y pegar textos
summary: Muy util... se agradece este tipo de ideas

description: La aplicación es simple y excelente, puedo pausar, controlar volumen de videos de youtube por ejemplo, con mi smartphone sin tener que levantarme del sofá
No se necesita instalar la app, cuenta con teclado, flechas y control de volumen, es maravillosa.
No necesita app en el movil, solo desde el explorador se puede controlar el pc es muy util.
summary: es un control del pc desde el movil

description: nothing, the qr code dosnt open anything
Au lancement, un terminal souvre avec un Qr code et tout ce qu'il faut pour facilement se connecter à l'interface web. Les mouvements de la souris sont fluides. Bref très bon logiciel.
